target: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_SEQ_00<tab>碧のタマミズのタコツボは、再び陸のヒトに頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TODO_00<tab>Ride the striped ray and use its Double Bubble ability on any withered plants.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TODO_00<tab>シマエイに騎乗して<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA51101 /var>や
<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA51401 /var>に水泡を使う

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how good of you to come by. My striped ray will be very happy to see you again. Ever since you departed, she has been quite forlorn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_000<tab>陸のヒト、こないだはありがとなぁ～。
あのシマエイ、おまえさんのことが忘れられんのか、
時々寂しげに、陸のほうを見とるぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_001<tab>Would you be willing to take her out for another swim?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_001<tab>だから、また相手してやってくれるかぁ～？
頼みたいこともあるもんでなぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_002<tab>Lately, I have taught her how to produce bubbles with her wings. Perhaps while you are out, you can use this new trick of hers to help clean up the area.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_002<tab>うちらのシマエイは、「水泡」を吹くよう調教してあってなぁ～。
そいつをつかって、海の掃除をしてほしいんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_003<tab>Since such a minuscule amount of light reaches this region, much of the seaweed and coral that grows here wilts. These clumps of dying plants, if left unattended, will begin to decay and pollute our village waters.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_003<tab>藻や汚れがついた海藻や珊瑚は、お日様の光をうけられなくて、
弱ってしまうもんでなぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_004<tab>The most effective way to remove them from the soil is to have the striped rays blast them with air bubbles. Once uprooted, the water currents will see to the rest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_004<tab>シマエイの散歩もかねて、弱った海藻や珊瑚を探して、
「水泡」を吹きつけて、キレイにしてやってくれるかぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_006<tab>Simply have my striped ray blast the dying plants with her air bubbles. The uprooted plants will then drift away in the currents and our village will remain clean!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_006<tab>シマエイの散歩もかねて、弱った海藻や珊瑚を探して、
「水泡」を吹きつけて、キレイにしてやってくれるかぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>These plants are so slippery that uprooting them by hand appears impossible. Mount a striped ray from Tamamizu, and use its Double Bubble ability to blast the plants from the soil.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>藻や汚れがついていて、素手では取れそうにない。
碧のタマミズの「タコツボ」に話しかけて、
「シマエイ」に騎乗し、「水泡」を吹きつけよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_010<tab>You have returned, friend! Thanks to you, the area around our village will remain clean for some time to come!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_010<tab>感謝、感謝だなぁ～。
たくさんの海藻や珊瑚を助けてくれたようで、嬉しいぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_011<tab><sigh> I just wish all the others realized how important a job this is. Sadly, they take our clean waters for granted. However, they will realize soon enough.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_011<tab>……そんな顔しなさんなぁ～。
砦のみんなもわかってないんだが、
これも大事な仕事なんだぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_012<tab>Ever since the imperials invaded Doma, the sea grows more unclean by the day. Our plants begin to die off much faster now and as a result the bigger fish have far less smaller fish to feed on.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_012<tab>ドマに帝国の奴らが来てから、海は汚くなる一方でなぁ～。
海藻や珊瑚が弱りゃ、小魚は住処を失い、
小魚がいなけりゃ、それを食う大きな魚もいなくなるんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_013<tab>If things continue to go on like this, the marine life around us will eventually perish, and so too will our village. I believe that the striped rays will help us put off this decline, but the others are yet to be convinced of their value.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_013<tab>巡り巡って、海も死んじまうのさぁ～。
だから、シマエイは海の医者って呼び方もあるんだぁ～。
呼んでるのは、オレぐらいなもんだけどもぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_014<tab>Either way, thank you for taking my striped ray out and helping tidy up the village. I hope you come back and visit us again soon!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ314_02710_TAKOTSUBO_000_014<tab>陸のヒト、ありがとなぁ～。
散歩だけでも、また手伝ってくれよぉ～。
